abstract: Microsoft is said to have offered to take over the Nook unit’s e-books and devices operations, but it is unclear whether there are any current talks on a possible deal.
snippet: Microsoft is said to have offered to take over the Nook unit’s e-books and devices operations, but it is unclear whether there are any current talks on a possible deal.
lead_paragraph: 5:29 p.m. | Updated Shares of Barnes & Noble skyrocketed in early trading on Thursday after a report said Microsoft was offering $1 billion for the digital assets of the bookseller’s e-reader business.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble Shares Jump on Sign of Microsoft Interest in Nook

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
